mapper.select: SELECT t1.id AS "id", t2.id AS "parentId", t1.name AS "name", t2.name AS "parentName", t1.id AS "key", t1.floor_code AS "code", t1.name AS "title", t1.floor_code AS "floorCode", t1.building_code AS "buildingCode" FROM sys_floor_info t1 LEFT JOIN sys_building_info t2 ON t1.building_code = t2.building_code AND t2.is_del = 0 WHERE t1.is_del = 0 UNION ALL SELECT t2.id AS "id", t4.id AS "parentId", t2.name AS "name", t4.name AS "parentName", t2.id AS "key", t2.room_code AS "code", t2.name AS "title", t2.floor_code AS "floorCode", t2.building_code AS "buildingCode" FROM sys_room_info t2 LEFT JOIN sys_floor_info t4 ON t2.building_code = t4.building_code AND t2.floor_code = t4.floor_code AND t4.is_del = 0 WHERE t2.is_del = 0 UNION ALL SELECT id AS "id", 1 AS "parentId", name AS "name", '杭州富阳颐乐老年护理中心' AS "parentName", id AS "key", building_code AS "code", name AS "title", '' AS "floorCode", building_code AS "buildingCode" FROM sys_building_info WHERE is_del = 0
